peopleAlsoAsk.question: How much is my sterling silver fork worth?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
How Much is Sterling Silver Worth? Sterling silverware may be worth as much as $5-$30+ per item, depending on the weight, condition, and purity. Most of the time when you sell sterling silver flatware, it will be sold to a refiner and melted down into pure silver.
Mar 29, 2024
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Is Sterling Silver Flatware Valuable? Here's How to Tell!

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Can I sell my sterling silver flatware?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Most any pawn shop, coin shop ,refiner, or metal buyer will buy your old sterling flatware for scrap value and then send it to out to be melted down.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Where can I sell old sterling silver flatware? - Quora

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do you calculate the value of sterling silver flatware?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Do the math: Multiply the weight of your item by its purity (0.925 for sterling or 0.900, 0.835, 0.800 and even 0.600 in some countries) by the current silver price. This gives you the base melt value, which is the absolute minimum your silver is worth.
